page.title: 14Religion in Congleton
page.content: {1.St Mary's R.C.}(West Road) opened July 12th 1826. Capacity 280 people school opened 1858. {2.Unitarian church}(Cross St.) built 1883. Capacity 300 people. {3.St John the Evangelist}(Buxton Old Road) Opened October 15th 1840. {4.St Stephen's}(Spragg St.) opened 1860. Capacity 400 people. {5.Congragational Church}(Antrobus St.) Building comenced 1877 replacing 1790 built church which is the present Masonic Hall in Mill St. {6.Methodist Central Church}(Waggs St) opened 1777. Capacity 400 people in early 1800s. The new wave meant the rise of Kinsey street Central Church. {7.St James's C.E.}(WestSt) Opened 31st January 1849 School built 1846.
